ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Light Sources
ygData.msgSnippet: Greater light stones,  and other gane light sorces work from an inventory slot to provide light...but not from a backpack ... From: Techpriest To: EverQuest
ygData.messageBody:
Greater light stones,  and other gane light sorces work from an inventory slot to provide light...but not from a backpack
----- Original Message -----
From: Techpriest
To: EverQuest (E-mail)
Sent: Sunday, December 07, 2003 11:03 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Light Sources

I have human paladin (level 6) and he suffers from the same problem the rest
of his race does.  He uses a 2 handed sword so I can't carry anything in my
hands.  I have the worn newbie candle in my pack for light.  I bought a
lantern but it did nothing in my pack.  I was looking in the bazaar and saw
lightstones, mechanical light emitters and various creature eyes.  Are any
of these a better light then my candle and can they be used from my pack?
When I look at the items it makes no mention of range or brightness.

Iksar monk 12
Wood Elf Ranger 12
Human Paladin 6
"just trying all the options to see what I like."




Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
